content.raw: @german-mas my only suggestion would be for the `refresh-interval` parameter to be expressed in seconds and to do the conversion to msecs internally as I don't think we will want to ping a server more than once a second. But maybe @chapulina or @iche033 can clarify on the expected granularity of it.
content.html: @german-mas my only suggestion would be for the refresh-interval parameter to be expressed in seconds and to do the conversion to msecs internally as I don't think we will want to ping a server more than once a second. But maybe @chapulina or @iche033 can clarify on the expected granularity of it.
